title: Provides that remaining campaign accounts be transferred to the state treasury after death of a candidate
summary: Provides that upon the death of a candidate, former candidate or holder of elective office, remaining campaign accounts be transferred to the state treasury unless a charitable organization has been designated to receive such moneys.
